code: import{Map}from"immutable";import*as actionTypes from"./constants";var defaultState=Map({currentArea:-1,currentType:{name:"推荐歌手",type:1},artistList:[]});function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_AREA:return state.set("currentArea",action.currentArea);case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_TYPE:return state.set("currentType",action.currentType);case actionTypes.CHANGE_ARTIST_LIST:return state.set("artistList",action.artistList);default:return state;}}export default reducer;
